Words to Kick Your Teeth Out

Rumble

    1. A man walked into town
    2. Bound up in a brown coat
    3. When he talked you could see
    4. Beneath his broad hat
    5. A cigarillo glow
    6. Red then black then red
    1. His face all bandaged
    2. The left arm just gone
    3. And the man had a limp when he walked
    4. Gauze and splints that talked
    1. I was younger then
    2. I kicked rocks across the road
    3. while the sun beat down
    4. Now I'm no educated man
    1. There was rumor of a rumble
    2. There's always rumors going round
    3. when strange men come into town
    1. I was not in the rumble
    2. A coward keeps his legs to run
    3. But when the violence was over
    4. I was the hacksaw
    5. The young carpenter's son
    1. And when the rumble was over
    2. I did not know who was dead
    3. I found gauze and splints and bones
    4. And I found a sieve full of lead
    1. A man walked out of town
    2. His face all bandaged
    3. The left arm just gone
    4. And he had a limp when he walked
    5. Gauze and splints that talked

Paging

Emotion Exercise
